alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 26 at 1:43AM MST until February 26 at 7:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CST /7 AM MST/ THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM CST /10 AM MST/ THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and western Texas. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 11 AM CST /10 AM MST/ this morning to midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight. For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 8 AM CST /7 AM MST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Southern Lea County
